PageTitle: reset ipv6 nd na anti-attack statistics
FuncDef: The reset ipv6 nd na anti-attack statistics command clears statistics about NA messages.
CLIs: reset ipv6 nd na anti-attack statistics slot <slot-id>

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a slot ID.
The value is a string of 1 to 32 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces.

Examples: <HUAWEI> reset ipv6 nd na anti-attack statistics slot 1
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If you need to check the number of NA messages sent to the CPU and the number of discarded NA messages in a period, run the reset ipv6 nd na anti-attack statistics command to clear the original statistics about NA messages on interfaces.
